mapper.sql: id, username, password, nickname, employee_number, department_id, gender, telephone, email, avatar_url, account_type_id, is_check, is_lock
mapper.select: select a.id, a.username, a.password, a.nickname, a.employee_number, a.department_id, a.gender, a.telephone, a.email, a.avatar_url, a.account_type_id, a.is_check, a.is_lock ,ac.name,ac.roles from account a LEFT JOIN account_type ac on a.account_type_id = ac.id where username = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into account (id, username, password, nickname, employee_number, department_id, gender, telephone, email, avatar_url, account_type_id, is_check, is_lock) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isCheck,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isLock,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into account
id,
username,
password,
nickname,
employee_number,
department_id,
gender,
telephone,
email,
avatar_url,
account_type_id,
is_check,
is_lock,

mapper.update:
update account
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employee_number = #{employeeNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avatar_url = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_type_id = #{accountTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_check = #{isCheck,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_lock = #{isLock,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update account set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee_number = #{employeeNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_type_id = #{accountTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_check = #{isCheck,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_lock = #{isLock,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
